extendedInfo.description: Now you can have all your travel needs at your finger tips with the new free Aer Lingus App. Whether it's planning trips, checking-in or checking flight status, accessing your travel information on the go is more convenient than ever! The Aer Lingus App allows you to:- Plan Your Trip- Flexible Date Search - Search for Low Fares by Day or by Month*- View Flight Details- Save Flights to Your Favourites- Complete Your Booking- Check-in for Flights*- Stay Up-To-Date with Travel Alerts- Check Flight Status Information*available on selected routes.

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: It allows you to check in but, at least on my HTC One, when you click on the e mail link for the boarding pass you are taken to the Aer Lingus site. It\'s pretty pointless if you aren\'t able to download your pass.
reviews.author: Liam Mac Uaid

reviews.title: Poor attempt
reviews.comment: Booking tool user interface is crap, you can only view one flight at a time instead of a list of all available flights.  Can\'t book sports equipment.
reviews.author: Declan Reilly

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Clunky and lacking basic functionality. Also Corfu airport doesn\'t appear as an option to check into... In any case why do I need to provide booking ref, departure and destination airports, and an email address to allow me to check in? Surely an aer lingus account should fill in the gaps if I provide one of these details? Very poor effort.
reviews.author: Kyle Somerville

reviews.title: Incomplete
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t have southend listed as an option when checking in.
reviews.author: Barry Keane

reviews.title: Kuk
reviews.comment: Kuk
reviews.author: Jim Deldehed

reviews.title: Flights made easy
reviews.comment: Little tweaks are needed. A smoother run from option boxes when booking but other than that, no complaints.
reviews.author: Ross Loughran

reviews.title: Really poor app
reviews.comment: Cant check in with it no matter what combination or variation I use of my surname. Would think an Irish company could deal with apostrophes. More half assed work from a semi state.
reviews.author: Colm O\'Keane

reviews.title: Very unresponsive
reviews.comment: Very slow to respond while trying to book flights and the GUI looks right one minute then basically falls apart another time, got sick of using it, use website instead
reviews.author: Adam Russell

reviews.title: Needs to be redesigned
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t make sense. Badly designed and annoying. An app needs to be able to stand on its own - not just be a wrapper around the website.
reviews.author: Hereward Cooper

reviews.title: Uninstalled after 30 seconds
reviews.comment: Terrible. Try to book a flight with this junk. Not possible.
reviews.author: Damien Bunyan

reviews.title: Not much use
reviews.comment: Not only doesn\'t link to your account to access your booking information but also doesn\'t link up functions so you have to retype all you data for online check in after you have accessed the data for your flight details, as well as put it all in again to check flight status.
reviews.author: tansy hutchinson

reviews.title: Doesn\'t store data
reviews.comment: Not sure what the point is of this app. It doesn\'t store any info so you have to reenter the data each time. Might as well just use the website.
reviews.author: Russell Pottinger

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Pointless as the online check in will not work. Such shoddy work from developers who obviously never heard of testing. One star too much really. Sort it out.
reviews.author: Laura Daly

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.comment: A very poor site. You can see your booking but I can\'t see any way to manage things like bags. The Aer Lingus main site is counter-intuitive and unhelpful as well -- to\"manage\"the return flight of a booking you have to enter the departure airport of your outward flight. Nuts!!
reviews.author: Richard Harris

reviews.title: No use to me at all
reviews.comment: Went to check my booking, doesn\'t have Belfast city airport listed but has the international twice, so couldn\'t go any further. In terms of check in didn\'t recognise me booking ref.....amateur hour :-(
reviews.author: Paul Hutchinson

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: I press continue and I stuck in it! Pleas fix it.
reviews.author: Patricia Moral

reviews.title: Crappy app
reviews.comment: Slow, connection issus, doesn\'t show flight details like seats, boarding time, gate, termin, etc.
reviews.author: Daniel Friedmann

reviews.title: Poor logic and user experience
reviews.comment: Not well executed at all. I suggest they should check out the easyjet app to see how it should be done.
reviews.author: Brian McCaul

reviews.title: Utter shit
reviews.comment: Enough said
reviews.author: Fiona Commins

reviews.comment: Disfunctional
reviews.author: Pj Long
